meta.title: Contact | Varena
meta.description: Tell us about your website project. We respond quickly to see if a landing, full site or shop suits your needs.

hero.title: Shall we talk about your website?
hero.description: Leave your details and tell us about your project. We'll reply to explore if working together makes sense and what format fits best.

prompts.title: You can mention, for example:
items: What you do and who you work with.
If you already have a website or you're starting from scratch.
What you'd like to change with a better site.
Whether you're thinking about a landing, a full site or an online store.

hint: Your first message is not a commitment. It's a conversation to see if we are a good fit.
